did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "Welfare Capitalism and the Workers in GE's Schenectady Works" and "Management Employment Policies and the Formation of Seniority Rule in GE" by Teiichi Sekiguchi.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two research papers by Teiichi Sekiguchi: "Welfare Capitalism and the Workers in GE's Schenectady Works" (1995) and "Management Employment Policies and the Formation of Seniority Rule in GE" (2004).

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Teiichi Sekiguchi Research Papers #6223m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: "Welfare Capitalism and the Workers in GE's Schenectady Works;" Chuo University, Institute of Business Research Paper No. 20; 37 pages; 1995; "Management Employment Policies and the Formation of Seniority Rule in GE;" 77 pages; 2004.
